thread.title: Graham Sullivan
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Graham Sullivan

author: Graham Sullivan
title: Graham Sullivan
text: Prompt service and the plastic pigeon spikes certainly achieved the objective. My only criticism would be about the misleading price - advertised without VAT and minus the compulsory first class postage. We're all now used to seeing these 'additional' items stated upfront (maybe Amazon has spoiled us) and it feels both archaic and misleading to be left discovering them on checkout.
